boardgame.name: Tybor der Baumeister
Tybor The Builder
boardgame.description: Tybor der Baumeister is set in the world of Longsdale, previously seen in Oh My Goods! and its expansions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the game, each player receives a hand of five multipurpose cards, each depicting a professional (priest, soldier, merchant, craftsman, etc.) who has come to Longsdale. After choosing a card to draft, the remaining cards are passed to the next player, then you may choose how to play your chosen card:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; As a worker, only the strength is relevant. The card is placed in the player's tableau._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; As a builder, this person is discarded, then you can build a building from the existing supply, discarding workers with a certain strength to build it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; As a citizen in the city, they provide special powers and facilitate the building of certain buildings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After a predetermined number of rounds, the point values of the buildings are summed, and whoever has the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tybor der Baumeister contains _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;chapters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and scenarios set during Tybor's lifespan that serve as variants for tasks or rules of play, with 32 possible combinations. With two copies of the game, up to eight players can compete at once._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Tybor der Baumeister: Im Auftrag des Königs

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Tybor der Baumeister (Österreichisches Spielemuseum), 0,2 Kg Condition/Zustand: new, unused and sealed / neu, unbenutzt und in Folie verpackt General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an.
